about_the_game:
Introducing a new fantasy character asset pack from REFMAP!

This collection includes walking character sprites along with corresponding side-view battlers. In Vol. 2, you’ll find even more versatile characters that can be used in various settings, just like in Vol. 1.

Be sure to try it out alongside Vol. 1 and the default assets!

*******************************************

Characters: 53

Main characters: 8 (8 bodies with collapsing motion)

Occupations: 8 characters + 5 arranged versions (9 collapsing motions, 5 special motions)

Townspeople: 8 + 1 arranged version (9 collapsing motions)

Animals: 19 (4 bodies with collapsing motions)

SV: 18 types

　Main characters: 8

　Occupations: 8 types + 1 arranged version

*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
detailed_description:
Introducing a new fantasy character asset pack from REFMAP!

This collection includes walking character sprites along with corresponding side-view battlers. In Vol. 2, you’ll find even more versatile characters that can be used in various settings, just like in Vol. 1.

Be sure to try it out alongside Vol. 1 and the default assets!

*******************************************

Characters: 53

Main characters: 8 (8 bodies with collapsing motion)

Occupations: 8 characters + 5 arranged versions (9 collapsing motions, 5 special motions)

Townspeople: 8 + 1 arranged version (9 collapsing motions)

Animals: 19 (4 bodies with collapsing motions)

SV: 18 types

　Main characters: 8

　Occupations: 8 types + 1 arranged version

*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
